SqlType.Name: Student_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: select * from Student where Name like $Name and Age >= $Age_Begin and Age <= $Age_End and Id = $Id and Id in $Ids

SqlType.Name: ArticleQuery
SqlType.SqlStatement: select a.ArticleTypeId,t.Title,u.UserName from C_Article a left join C_ArticleType t on a.ArticleTypeId = t.ArticleTypeId left join C_ArticleRecommend r on a.ArticleId = r.ArticleId left join C_Users u on t.CreatorId = u.UserId where t.title like $TypeTitle and a.CreatorId = $CreatorId and t.MenderId = $MenderId and 3 > 1

SqlType.Name: GetPeopleInfo
SqlType.SqlStatement: select p.*,s.Name as SchoolName,u.Email as UserEmail from People p left join School s on p.SchoolId = s.Id left join C_Users u on p.UserId = u.UserId where s.Name = $SchoolName and p.Status = $Status

SqlType.Name: People_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: {'pager'='true'/* 表示要分页*/,'orderby'/*排序设置*/ = 'CreateTime asc|desc,Id asc|desc,Name asc|desc,SchoolId asc|desc,Status asc|desc,UpdateTime asc|desc,UserId asc|desc'} select * from People //可以是单表（视图）或者多表（视图）关联查询 where Id = $Id //$ 表示紧挨着变量，此处表示有一个变量Id，对应int类型 and Id in $Ids// in 操作表示变量Ids是一个List<int>对象 and Name like $Name //like 模糊搜索 and SchoolId = $SchoolId and Status = $Status and UserId = $UserId and CreateTime >= $CreateTime_Begin and CreateTime <= $CreateTime_End and isnull(Name,'') != '' //常量条件

SqlType.Name: People_HighQuery
Test
TestCase
SqlType.SqlStatement: select * from Sys_WF_Meta where (case when 1 = 1 then (select max(id) from Sys_WF_Meta) else $B end) = $A

SqlType.Name: Sys_NodeState_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: select * from Sys_NodeState where Id = $Id and InstanceId = $InstanceId and NodeId = $NodeId and Status = $Status and Operator = $Operator and Initialed = $Initialed

SqlType.Name: WorkflowState_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: {'pager'='true','orderby' = 'CreateTime asc|desc,Creator asc|desc,Data asc|desc,Initialed asc|desc,Status asc|desc,UpdateTime asc|desc'} select * from Sys_WorkflowState where WFId = $WFId and Status = $Status and Id = $Id and CurrentNodeId = $CurrentNodeId and Initialed = $Initialed

SqlType.Name: Sys_Parallel_ExecuteLine_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: select * from Sys_Parallel_ExecuteLine where Id = $Id and Id in $Ids and NodeId = $NodeId and NodeId in $NodeIds and ExecuteLineId = $ExecuteLineId and ExecuteLineId in $ExecuteLineIds

SqlType.Name: WF_Meta_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: {'orderby' = 'CreateTime asc|desc,Creator asc|desc,Description asc|desc,IsFolder asc|desc,Name asc|desc,Recyled asc|desc,UpdateTime asc|desc'} select * from Sys_WF_Meta where IsFolder = $IsFolder and Name = $Name and ParentId = $ParentId and Recyled = $Recyled

SqlType.Name: Sys_NodeDefine_Query
SqlType.SqlStatement: select * from Sys_NodeDefine where Id = $Id and Id in $Ids and ExecuteLineId = $ExecuteLineId and NodeType = $NodeType and RefWFId = $RefWFId and Status = $Status and Status in $StatusS and WFId = $WFId and WFId in $WFIds
